lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: | align=center colspan=2 | irepuburika y'uburundi urundi ni igihugu kiri mu bufirika bw'ubuseruko
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: bukikujwe n'urwanda mu buraruko tanzania mu buseruko hamwe n'irepuburika iharanira idemokarasi ya kongo rdc mu burengero
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: ikiyaga tanganyika kiri mu burengero bw'uburundi kiri hafi y'umurwa mukuru bujumbura kikaba ari ica kabiri kw'isi gifise munsi kure cane
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: abashakashatsi bavuga yuko uburundi bwamyeho ka gihugu cikwiye kuva mu kinjana ca 16
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: mu mwaka w'1903 ni ho catakaza intahe y'ukwikukira igihe hashikiye abadagi umwami w'ico gihe mwezi gisabo akaba yasinyanye na bo umwumvikano w'i kiganda
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: haheze indwano y'isi yose ya mbere caciye gicurwa bufuni na buhoro n'igihugu c'ububirigi
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: uburundi bwarafatanijwe n'igihugu c'urwanda rwanda urundi
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: ku wa 1 mukakaro 1962 niho casubira kuronka intahe yaco y'ukwikukira irondewe n'umuganwa rwagasore rudoviko umuhungu w'umwami mwambutsa bangiricenge akaba n'umukuru w'umugambwe w'abadasigana uprona
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: uburundi cari igihugu cifashe kandi cagutse
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: mu nyuma ku ntwaro y'ababirigi gitakaza ubugufi imwe mu ntara yari nini ica yegukira tanzaniya
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: akahise k'uburundi karanzwe n'igihe c'ubwami bwa kera bwabayeho imbere y'ubukoroni n'imbibe zitahindutse
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: uburundi bwashinze imizi kuva mu kinjana ca 16 canke ca 17 mu karere karimwo abantu kuva mu kimpumbi ca mbere imbere y'umuzo wa yezu kirisu
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: bwari ubwami bushingiye ku migenzo n'amategeko kama y'imana umwe wese akamenya ico ajejwe ariko kandi ata migenderanire ishemeye n'amakungu iriho
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: ico gihugu rero kitagira imihora co muri afirika y'ubuseruko gitumbereye mu karere k'ibiyaga binini kikaba kigizwe n'abahutu bangana n'ibice 85% abatutsi bangana n'ibice 14% n'abatwa bangana n'igice 1% kikaba kirangwa n'imico imwe n'ururimi rumwe
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: indimi zizwi kandi zikoreshwa mu kazi ni ikirundi igifaransa igiswahili gikoreshwa canecane mu buzima b'urudandazwa
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: kuva uburundi buronse ukwikukira bwagize ingorane nyinshi zijanye n'ivyimibano n'iporitike zagumye zigaruka ari zo zatumye haba indwano haba abahungiye mu mahanga abandi bakegeranirizwa hagati mu gihugu harasamburwa inyubakwa z'iterambere n'ubutunzi
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: indwano yabaye mu burundi mu 1993 ni yo yabaye ndende cane kandi ni na yo yagize inkurikizi mbi cane ku vyerekeye iporitike
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: kukaba nkako uretse ihagarikwa ry'umuzo w'idemokarasi n'itituka ry'ivyerekana iterambere mu vyerekeye ubutunzi ico kiza nyene c'intambara cateye caranatumye haba itituka ry'ubutegetsi n'akaranga mu bice vyinshi vy'igihugu
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: kimwe mu bituma indyane zidahera ni igwirirana ry'abantu mu matongo yaze n'inkurikizi zaryo ku butunzi busanzwe bushimikiye canecane ku burimyi
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: abenegihugu bangana n'imiriyoni umunani ugereranije bagwirirana ku rugero rugwijije na kabiri uko imyaka mirongo itatu iheze bakagwira kurugero rungana n'ibice 3% ku mwaka
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: tugereranije dusanga hafi ica kabiri c'abarundi bafise munsi y'imyaka 15 ibice bingana 90% babeshwaho n'uburimyi
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: abangana n'ibice 70% na bo usanga baronka agahembo kari munsi y'idorari rimwe ry'abanyamerika ku musi
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: inyuma y'ihagarikwa ry'idemokarasi mu 1993 ibihugu bigize kano karere ubuganda tanzaniya ubufirika bw'epfo bishigikiwe n'amakungu vyarafashe ingingo yo kugarukana amahoro mu gihugu , ibiganiro vyatumye haba ishirwa ry'igikumu i arusha ku masezerano y'amahoro n'umwumvikano mu uburundi
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: amasezerano y'i arusha ashimikiye ku mwumvikano n'ubumwe mu gihugu agategekanya n'ingene abadasangiye ubwoko boserukirwa ata mahinyu
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: ishirwa mu ngiro ry'amasezerano ryabaye intango y'intwaro y'infatakibanza mu ntambwe yashitseko iyihambaye ikaba yabaye ishikirizwa muri gitugutu umwaka w'2001 ry'ibwirizwa shingiro rizogenga itunganywa ry'inzego mu kiringo c'amezi 36.muri ruhuhuma umwaka w'2005 abarundi barahamagariwe kwemeza irindi bwirizwa shingiro biciye mu matora
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: iryo bwirizwa shingiro risubirira iryamaze amezi 36 rirasigura neza ko uburundi ari irepuburika yigenga ifise n'idemokarasi kandi itisunga idini na rimwe " yubahiriza ubudasa bw'amoko n'amadini ".
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: iryo bwirizwa shingiro rirubahiriza urugero amoko aserukirwa mu vy'iporitike mu nzego mu buzi bw'ireta rikongera rikubahiriza intwaro ihuriyemwo abanyeporitike n'abajejwe umutekano mu gushinga urugero ahahutu n'abatutsi baserukirwako badasize inyuma kwubahiriza uguserukirwa kw'abakenyezi ku bice 30%
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: uburundi ni igihugu gitunzwe canecane n'uburimyi hamwe n'ubworozi
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: ibice 90% vy'abarundi ni co bakora
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: kuva mu 1993 aho indwano itereye bifatanijwe n'ibihano bwafatiwe mu 1996 n'ibihugu bibanyi vyo kwugara imbibe ubukene bwariyongereye cane
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: 2 insigarirazina-ngereka n'insigarirazina rugena ni ijambo rigenekereza izina rigeretsweko

lines.value: 3 insigarirazina-ngereka n'insigarirazina nsanisha ni ijambo ryerekana isano riri hagati y'ibintu bibiri ico rigeretsweko hamwe n'ikindi

lines.value: 4 insigarirazina-ngereka n'insigarirazina satunga ni ijambo ryerekana nyene ibintu n'isano afitaniye n'ibintu vyiwe

lines.value: 6 insigarirazina-ngereka n'insigarirazina gaharura gatondesha murongo ni ijambo ryerekana ikibanza ikintu giherereyemwo mu rutonde rufatiye ku guharura

lines.value: 7 insigarirazina-ngereka n'insigarirazina kabaza ni ijambo ryerekana ibintu ivyo ari vyo aho bibarizwa canke uko bingana ribicishije mu kubaza

lines.value: 8 insigarirazina-ngereka n'insigarirazina ntatanya mu rudende ni ijambo ryerekana ikintu kitagabanije canke kiri mu murongo w'ibindi mu bwinshi ni ijambo rikoraniriza mu mugwi umwe ibintu rirangura

lines.value: kubwandwa rero cari igikorwa cagigwa n'abarundi bo hambere nka bose!imbere y'uko ubukoroni colonisation butangura abazungu baraje kwigisha amadini mashasha maze abarundi baheba kiranga batangura gusenga imana mu bundi buryo
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: amadini y'ubukirisu nka gatorika eglise catholique niyo yiharije inyigisho z'imana nshanha
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: aba islamu nabo nyene ntibatanzwe kuza kwigisha ivy'imana.naho abarundi bari binjiye idini rishasha ry'ubukirisu ubuislamu nabwo nyene bwararonse abanywanyi
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: inyigisho nazo zabo zikaba zivuga ko :"ata mana ikwiye gusengwa vy'ukuri atari allah kandi ko muhamadi ari intumwa y'imana".ubwo butumwa bushasha bwace busubirira ubwo abera missionnaires blancs bari bigishije ko yesu jesus ari umwana w'imana kandi ko ukwemera kwabo kugizwe n'ubutatu butagatifu :data,(pere) mwana,(fils hamwe na mutima mweranda( saint esprit).ubwisiramu rero buza buhakana ko yesu atari umwana w'imana ahubwo ari intumwa y'imana nkuko nyanditswe mu gitabo ceranda korani cahishuriwe intumwa ya allah muhamadi
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: ubwisirimu rero mu burundi bushinga imizi bukebuke gushika n'ubu
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: abemera idini rya islamu babandnya bagwira gushika n'ubu aho bashika ku bice 15 kw'ijana!benshi muribo bavuga ururimi rw'igiswahili swahili kandi bakaba benshi baba mu dusagara dusanga mu gihugu cose c'uburundi
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: bimwe muvyo aba islamu bemera abisiramu baremera imana imwe rudende intumwa zayo zose harimwo ya yesu),ibitabo vyerenda korani zaburi injili umusi w'umuhero abamarayika urubanza rwo ku musi w'iherezo,ijuru hamwe n'umuriro udahera
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: gusenga muri islamu abasiramu bategetswe gusenga gatanu ko musi.biratandukanye cane n'ivyo abakirisu bagira.hanyuma umusi w'ikoraniro ryo kugenda kumviriza inyigisho ni ku musi wa gatanu mweranda w'indwi.uwo musi ni uwo gusangira igisabisho kandi utegetswe kuri bose
lines.name: Kirundi

lines.value: igisabisho nyamukuru umusiramu wese ategerezwa kuvuga gatanu ku musi ni ikigabane ca mbere c'igitabo ceranda korani naco kikaba kivuga giti 1.kw'izina ry'imana nyenimbabazi nyeningiro 2.amashimwe yose ni ay'imana,umufasha w'abantu bose 3.nyene imbabazi,nyeningiro
lines.name: Kirundi
